199.heading: Cascão.
199.title: Mônica.
199.author: [No author]
notes: SUMMARY: Mônica is based on Mauricio's oldest daughter. Cascão and Cebolinha tease her all the time about being fat and bucktoothed. She bonks them on the head with her stuffed bunny. She is very tough.
